wikipedia_page.main: Colonel David Milne Home (1838 – 19 November 1901) was a British soldier and Conservative politician.

response: *David Milne Home (politician) (1838–1901), British soldier and Conservative politician

link_mentions.page: List of UK Parliamentary election petitions
response: | 21 July 1880 || Berwick-upon-Tweed || John McLaren || David Milne Home || Returning officer wrongly refused and rejected votes; scrutiny of votes || Duly elected || Some irregularly marked votes which had been rejected were held good. The scrutiny resulted in Home's majority increasing from two to three. || 3 O'M & H 178; HCP 1881 10 p. 3-4
